text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC No, that governor is smart and knew that having a convention where people were not wearing masks or social distancing would bring Covid-19 to his state. So now you’re going to bring the convention to J’ville where you will have to wear masks and social distance.
